name: Laundry Trouble
description:
This is a game for the actual adult game jam about doing the laundry.

Pick clothes of the same colour and load the washing machine with them to score points. Put the wrong colour clothes in the washing machine and you will lose a live. 

Lose 3 lives and it's game over. You only have some time to load the laundry so keep an eye for the time bar!

Controls: 
arrows to move

z to load the washing machine with your picked clothes

x to drop the last item that you are carrying (use this if you accidentally picked the wrong colour item)

Credits: 

code: misato (me)

art: Kerrie Lake https://kerrielakeportfolio.wordpress.com/

sfx and music: Bibiki https://bibiki.itch.io/

The game has some bugs but there's no more time to finish it before the end of the jam :(
